column4: I am pretty sure (correct me if im wrong) that you can't jut dump the files from a bootable iso to a usb drive and expect it to boot

there are tools to make a usb drive bootable... and not every flashdrive is bootable, its kinda luck of the draw if yours is bootable or not, there is no indicator to tell you if one is when you are buying it
thanks for that piece of info
